root.name: Mice Profiler Label Analyser
root.description: Mice profiler temporal analysis of data
root.author: fab - Fabrice de Chaumont
root.changelog:
- Version 7.0.0.9 Date 2014-08-26 14:20:54
- fix a layout problem in the xls export
- Version 7.0.0.8 Date 2014-07-18 17:25:09
Now provides much more output settings for transition graph generation
- Version 7.0.0.7 Date 2014-07-17 17:47:31
User can now set start and end time to export using export all data (in pool).
- Version 7.0.0.6 Date 2014-06-18 12:20:10
Fix a bug if animals are removed manually from the swimming pool viewer
- Version 7.0.0.5 Date 2014-06-12 14:17:01
Fix a bug in the output of the transition graph.
- Version 7.0.0.4 Date 2013-11-15 11:29:08
Fix a problem in the outputs if events were at the very beginning of the timeline.
- Version 7.0.0.3 Date 2013-10-15 16:06:53
Some GUI change. New automated export (to be improved)
- Version 7.0.0.2 Date 2012-09-05 10:59:59
An empty graph now export nothing without crash. Export all data with empty pool does not crash anymore
- Version 7.0.0.1 Date 2012-07-06 16:11:06
Now supports any fps
- Version 7.0.0.0 Date 2012-05-16 13:39:07
Now works with x64 architectures
- Version 0.0.1.0 Date 2012-03-05 14:22:12
